original_text: Solomon decided to build a house to give honour to the Lord's name. He also decided to build a royal palace for himself.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 이름을 위하여 성전을 건축하고 자기 왕위를 위하여 궁궐 건축하기를 결심하니라

sentences.original_text: Solomon decided to build a house
to give honour to the Lord's name
He also decided to build a royal palace
